tags: had this dream like a year ago
i hope someone finds this somewhat interesting idk
summary: Toffee Brick Stairs
title: Toffee Brick Stairs
body:
i had a dream that for some reason dan and phil were at my school and dan asked me if i had any chocolate for phil. i said probably but then i didn’t have my bag so i ran up the stairs to get it.

the stairs were made of glass and had like huge bricks of toffee inside. there were small openings where students were able to get the toffee out so i stuffed like 10 into my pockets and ran down.

there was a shop on the basement floor of the school and everybody looked like phil but slightly off. my classmate laughed at me because “how can you not recognize the person whose face you stare at for 90% of your life” and i was just trying to find a phil with a dan. i was so unsure but finally i decided to go with the phil who had the worst posture and i was right.

so i gave him one huge toffee brick and he smiled and said thank you. i slapped the toffees in my pockets and bragged that i have more and gave him another one. that one was green. (even though they had been the same colour before.)

and then i went outside and it skipped to night and i started to walk somewhere. phil was passed out on a bench.

and i woke up and felt bad because he probably didn’t want that green toffee because i had opened it.

wot.
